meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>ticket</kanji> you <kanji>sell</kanji> <kanji>before</kanji>hand are <vocabulary>advance ticket</vocabulary>s. This is a <vocabulary>ticket sold in advance</vocabulary>. Buy your tickets early, or how else will you get in on a Conan audience?
readingMnemonic: The readings are 前, 売る and 券 combined into one awkward word.
